bibl.title: The Abinnaeus Archive. Papers of a Roman Officer in the Reign of Constantius II.
bibl.seg: Bell H.I., V. Martin, E.G. Turner and D. van Berchem (collected and re-edited by), The Abinnaeus Archive. Papers of a Roman Officer in the Reign of Constantius II.

C.R. par E. Wipszycka, Przeglad historyczny 54 (1963) pp. 700-703. - E. Boswinkel, Mnemosyne 4e s., 19 (1966) pp. 100-102. - Ém. Demougeot, REA 66 (1964) pp. 218-222. - E. Van't Dack, BibO 21 (1964) pp. 313-314. - P. Petit, AntCl 33 (1964) pp. 246-247. - J.D. Thomas, JHS 84 (1964) pp. 185-186. - D. Bonneau, Iura 14 (1963) pp. 304-311. - St.I. Oost, CP 59 (1964) pp. 59-60. - B.R. Rees, CR N.S., 14 (1964) pp. 102-103. - Em. Gabba, RivFil 91 (1963) pp. 485-486. - N. Lewis, CW 57 (1963) pp. 156-157. - Th. Pekáry, MusHelv 20 (1963) p. 257. - Cl. Vandersleyen, Latomus 22 (1963) pp. 887-890. - H. Gerstinger, Gnomon 35 (1963) pp. 728-730. - J. Bingen, ChrEg 38 (1963) No. 75, pp. 182-184.
